typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_id} as string,
		date as string,
		dateint as string,
		airport as string,
		temp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select() ~> Select1
Select1 window() ~> Window1
